meanings.definition: A type of plastic made from phenol and formaldehyde, used in electrical equipment and other products.
meanings.sent1: The bakelite casing protected the wires inside the radio.
meanings.sent2: She collected vintage bakelite jewelry from the 1940s.
meanings.sent3: The bakelite plastic decided to throw a party for all the other materials in the toolbox.
meanings.sent4: The bakelite walls of the factory stood strong against the test of time.
meanings.sent5: The bright red bakelite material gleamed under the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The antique phone on the shelf was a bakelite.
meanings.sent2: He admired the intricate design of the bakelite buttons.
meanings.sent3: The bakelite figurine on the mantelpiece seemed to wink at him mischievously.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of bakelite items was a colorful mosaic of memories.
meanings.sent5: The bakelite handle felt smooth and cool to the touch.
